welcome_message_body: "Welcome to the beautiful and vibrant cities of USA and Japan! From stunning landscapes and iconic landmarks to rich cultural heritage and delicious cuisine, we invite you to immerse yourself in the charm and wonders of these cities. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Oita Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Oita Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may have limited coverage in certain areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ube Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ube Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
